title: Immediate hypnotic induction / Quantum hypnosis
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates strong and immediate hypnotic induction on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass Magnetic Path in Paris. Dr. Paret used Fascination - the power of the gaze and very quickly she entered in a deep hypnotic trance state of hypnotic induction. After waking up she says she felt like being in the clouds. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
